Package index

All functions

all_questions() all_solutions()
Format a problem/solution into markdown
build_problemset()
Container for multiple problem templates
ceilingk() floork()
Ceiling and floor with different precision
comma_and()
Concatenate a list with commands and a concluding "and"
comp()
Compare values and summarize as (in)equality symbols
compile_text()
LaTeX-friendly string interpolation
dotplot()
Dot plot (histograms)
format_problem() format_solution()
Format a problem/solution into markdown with figures and tables
format_problems()
Format a list of problems and (optionally) solutions
indep_tab()
Generate independent two-way tables
is_neg()
Check for negative values
lgd()
Expand inequality symbol to word
lower_tail()
Determine whether a p-value calculation should use lower.tail.
neq()
Shortcut for LaTeX not equal character
points_block()
Generate table of quiz points
rdist()
Random finite probability distribution
repractice_shiny_tabbed()
Tabbed Shiny interface for multiple problem sets
simple_prop() pet_prop() simple_percent() simple_prop_percent() simple_successes() simple_percent_successes() dotplot_visual_prop()
Simple proportion/percent problem templates.
t_ineq_pval()
Calculate p-value for a t test.
vspace()
Shortcut for LaTeX vertical spacing
wrapif()
Wrap in delimiters under certain conditions
z_ineq_pval()
Calculate p-value for a z-test.
